description: Turn heads with this fun and colourful lolly cake. This simple cake hack delivers above and beyond in terms of flavour, ease and wow-factor.
name: Party Mix Lolly Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using picture as a guide, press lollies, freckles and Smarties into frosting to secure. Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.
